message_1: In a round-robin tournament of 9 teams, each team plays every other team exactly once. How many games are played in total?
message_2:
In a round-robin tournament, each team plays every other team exactly once. For 9 teams, we can use the combination formula to determine the total number of games played:

C(n, k) = n! / (k!(n-k)!)

where n is the total number of teams (9) and k is the size of the combination (2, since each game consists of 2 teams).

C(9, 2) = 9! / (2!(9-2)!)
= 9! / (2!7!)
= (9 × 8 × 7!)/(2 × 7!)
= (9 × 8)/2
= 36

So, a total of 36 games are played in the round-robin tournament of 9 teams.
